div.style: background-image: url(http://www.thepartnership.us/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/ppp_0019_DJI_0010-copy-uai-258x80.png);background-repeat: no-repeat;background-position: center center;background-attachment: scroll;background-size: cover;

div.class: row single-top-padding single-bottom-padding single-h-padding row-child limit-width
pos-middle pos-center align_center column_child col-lg-12 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

h3.span: Partnership Schools are tuition-free charter schools for grades 6-12. Our dedicated teachers and support staff, small class sizes, and individualized learning plans help our students develop the skills they need to achieve success in school and beyond.

a.class: custom-link btn btn-xl border-width-0 btn-color-164870 btn-circle btn-icon-left btn-ripple-out btn-border-animated

div.style: background-image: url(http://www.thepartnership.us/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/ppp_0006_DSC_0670-uai-258x138.png);background-repeat: no-repeat;background-position: center center;background-attachment: scroll;background-size: cover;

div.class: row single-top-padding single-bottom-padding single-h-padding row-child limit-width
pos-middle pos-center align_center column_child col-lg-12 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

h1.span: Nurturing the youth and strengthening communities.

h3.span: Our wide variety of supportive services for family strengthening, empowering youth, and supporting vulnerable teens are offered at every Partnership school.

a.class: custom-link btn btn-xl border-width-0 btn-color-164870 btn-circle btn-icon-left btn-ripple-out btn-border-animated

div.style: background-image: url(http://www.thepartnership.us/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/shutterstock_555450025_comp-uai-258x172.jpg);background-repeat: no-repeat;background-position: center center;background-attachment: scroll;background-size: cover;

div.class: row single-top-padding single-bottom-padding single-h-padding row-child limit-width
pos-middle pos-center align_center column_child col-lg-12 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

h3.span: We provide many programs to serve the practical needs of our community. Our programs are designed to educate, prevent, and help youths and their families overcome problems in a supportive environment.

a.class: custom-link btn btn-xl border-width-0 btn-color-164870 btn-circle btn-icon-left btn-ripple-out btn-border-animated

article.class: page-body style-light-bg post-22 page type-page status-publish hentry

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-12 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

span.h3: The mission of Pima Partnership Schools is to empower future leaders through quality middle school and high school education. We provide rigorous, individualized learning in a supportive environment to help students in Southern Arizona graduate and succeed in their college and professional careers.

a.class: custom-link btn border-width-0 btn-color-164870 btn-icon-left btn-ripple-in btn-border-animated

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-12 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

tmb tmb-light tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg

div.p: Arizona Collegiate High School is a tuition-free charter school for grades 9-12 in Phoenix. Our focus is helping our students develop their character through leadership and community service while mastering academic skills necessary to excel in high school, college, and the competitive professional world.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-4 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg

div.p: Pima Partnership High School is a tuition-free charter school for grades 9-12, honored by the Education Equity Foundation as a top school for closing the achievement gap for at-risk students. Our career-focused learning plans help our students develop the skills they need to achieve success in high school and beyond.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-4 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-middle pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg

div.p: Pima Partnership Academy is a tuition-free charter middle school and top-ranking STEM school, providing rigorous and individualized education for grades 6-8. Our school curriculum, positive culture, and student support services help students develop the skills they need for future academic and career success.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-12 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-middle pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-12 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-middle pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: PPP operates the Sin Puertas Adolescent Behavioral Health Clinic in Tucson. It is licensed by the Arizona Department of Health Services to assist a minimum of 250 youths (ages 13-17) each year with overcoming their substance use and/or mental health issues. Sin Puertas utilizes evidence-based practices, which have proven to help youth achieve well-being and sobriety over time.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Established by PPP in 1995, in collaboration with numerous community institutions, the Pima County Teen Court (PCTC) is a sentencing option for 12-17 year-old delinquent youths arrested for first, second, and third-time misdemeanors who have pled guilty. These teens choose to be sentenced by a jury of their peers instead of going through the Pima County Juvenile Court system. All participants in the courtroom are teens, except for the adult judge, who is a professional.

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Since 2000, the Pima Prevention Partnership has been providing parenting skills training and family strengthening workshops in Pima and Maricopa Counties. The major goal of the Strengthening Arizona’s Families (SAF) Program is to help families avoid substance use and other unhealthy risk behaviors among their children.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Since 1998, Pima Prevention Partnership’s B-Unique Teen Pregnancy Prevention program has focused on building healthy relationships, teen pregnancy prevention, and STD/HIV prevention education for 8,000 pre-teens and teens each year in Pima and Maricopa Counties.

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: We will work to support you in achieving your goals in the various areas of your life, such as education, career, health, and personal relationships. Over the next 12 months, you will work with us to build skills and seek out community resources that support you in your re-engagement efforts.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Pima Prevention Partnership serves as a program site for the Arizona AmeriCorps state program, a volunteer and service program funded by the Governor’s Office of Youth, Faith, and Families and the Corporation for National Community Service.

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Fresh Arizona is Pima Prevention Partnership’s statewide initiative to reduce tobacco use among populations with disparately high tobacco use rates: low-income communities, ethnic minority communities, behavioral health populations, and gender and sexual minority (GSM) communities.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Pima Prevention Partnership’s AZ Rise Mentoring is an exciting and dynamic program that aims to give our youth the skills and confidence to make positive choices through caring relationships with trusted near peer mentors.

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: The goal of Pima Prevention Partnership’s Pathways to Justice Careers Workforce Development Program, Pima PJC for short, is to motivate high school juniors and seniors who live in low-resourced, high-crime areas to consider first responder and justice careers.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light img-circle tmb-img-ratio tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg
pos-top pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Pima Prevention Partnership offers a variety of programs and support services

div.p: Pima Partnership Academy is a tuition-free charter middle school and top-ranking STEM school, providing rigorous and individualized education for grades 6-8. Our school curriculum, positive culture, and student support services help students develop the skills they need for future academic and career success.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-top pos-center align_left column_child col-lg-6 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

pos-top pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: We provide comprehensive support services for each student, including academic tutoring and counseling, as well as college and career preparation.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: We provide individualized class schedules with valuable opportunities for credit recovery for students who have struggled in traditional school settings.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: We work with each student individually to chart his or her pathway to graduation and expedited degree attainment.

div.class: pos-top pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-3 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: We provide comprehensive support services for each student, including academic tutoring and counseling, as well as college and career preparation.

h2.span: The school makes you feel safe, it feels like a family here.

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_center column_child col-lg-4 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg

h2.span: Our school offered different ways to earn credits, including online classes. The teachers were very helpful and nice. They held me accountable.

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_center column_child col-lg-4 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
tmb tmb-light tmb-media-first tmb-media-last tmb-content-overlay tmb-no-bg

h2.span: We are fully committed to preparing our students for life beyond high school.

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-4 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter
pos-middle pos-center align_left column_parent col-lg-4 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

div.p: Want a high-quality education with small class sizes and a safe community you can belong to? Come graduate with us!

div.class: pos-middle pos-center align_center column_parent col-lg-4 boomapps_vccolumn single-internal-gutter

","select_all_link":"Select all pages","clear_selection":"Clear Selection.","pagination":{"all":"All","next":"Next","previous":"Previous"},"select":{"rows":{"0":"","_":": Selected %d rows","1":": Selected 1 row"}},"datepicker":{"dayNames":["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"],"dayNamesShort":["Sun","Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat"],"dayNamesMin":["S","M","T","W","T","F","S"],"monthNames":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"monthNamesShort":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"monthNamesMin":["Jan","Feb","Mar","Apr","May","Jun","Jul","Aug","Sep","Oct","Nov","Dec"],"nextText":"Next","prevText":"Prev","currentText":"Today","closeText":"Done","today":"Today","clear":"Clear"}};/* */

/* */ var DavesWordPressLiveSearchConfig = {"resultsDirection":"","showThumbs":"false","showExcerpt":"false","displayPostCategory":"false","showMoreResultsLink":"true","activateWidgetLink":"true","minCharsToSearch":"0","xOffset":"0","yOffset":"0","blogURL":"http://www.thepartnership.us","ajaxURL":"http://www.thepartnership.us/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php","viewMoreText":"View more results","outdatedJQuery":"Dave's WordPress Live Search requires jQuery 1.2.6 or higher. WordPress ships with current jQuery versions. But if you are seeing this message, it's likely that another plugin is including an earlier version.","resultTemplate":"
    <% _.each(searchResults, function(searchResult, index, list) { %> <% // Thumbnails if(DavesWordPressLiveSearchConfig.showThumbs == "true" && searchResult.attachment_thumbnail) { liClass = "post_with_thumb"; } else { liClass = ""; } %>
  • <% if(DavesWordPressLiveSearchConfig.displayPostCategory == "true" && searchResult.post_category !== undefined) { %> <%= searchResult.post_category %> <% } %><%= searchResult.post_title %> <% if(searchResult.post_price !== undefined) { %>

    <%- searchResult.post_price %>

    <% } %> <% if(DavesWordPressLiveSearchConfig.showExcerpt == "true" && searchResult.post_excerpt) { %> <%= searchResult.post_excerpt %> <% } %> <% if(e.displayPostMeta) { %>

    Posted by <%- searchResult.post_author_nicename %>

    <%- searchResult.post_date %>

    <% } %>
    • <% }); %> <% if(searchResults[0].show_more !== undefined && searchResults[0].show_more && DavesWordPressLiveSearchConfig.showMoreResultsLink == "true") { %>
    <%- DavesWordPressLiveSearchConfig.viewMoreText %>
    <% } %>
"}; /* */
